I saw another buyer say she didn't like how it looked on her shoulders, and I am here to echo that if you are self conscious of broad shoulders, this is probably not the dress for you. I don't know if it's the wide strap placement or the short torso that hit above my natural waist, but I'm returning it for that reason. That said, it's a decent dress. The glittery outside looked itchy, but the dress is fully lined on the inside, which I wouldn't necessarily expect from a dress at this price from Amazon. I am 5'5" and normally a size 6-8; I ordered a size 10 and it was maybe a teensy bit too large, but I think it would have been snug if I sized down. I think this would look best on people whose natural waist is closer to their bust.

My 12yr old wore this to her dance. It was perfect. She loved it. It was very well made and stunning in person. It fit exactly as we thought and was true to her size. The zipper was strong and didn’t give us problems (we’ve had issues with that in the past), the material didn’t shed sparkles/shimmer everywhere, and the straps were adjustable to make her feel more secure. There are little pads sewn into the dress so she didn’t have to wear a bra and they gave her an added sense of security that nothing would show through. Overall she loved her dress and the price was perfect for the amazing quality!

I bought this dress for my graduation, and it was absolutely stunning! The glitter in the dress is just like the picture and makes you feel like Cinderella. The skirt does have a little structure to it, but is not as voluminous as shown in the pictures. I was a little nervous about the thinness of the straps, thinking they may pinch on my shoulders, but the dress was very comfortable to wear all day long.  As someone with a larger bust it is always a gamble buying a dress online, as many of them are too tight. I ended up ordering the size 12 (I'm 5'8" and wear a 36D), and the dress fit well. I probably could have even gone down a size to have a more push-up look.  Overall this dress was the perfect thing for a special occasion, and I would recommend it!
